HavokMUD: havok.haaksman.org on port 6969)

Welcome Everyone to Havok's Official Website.  Havok is a Text Based Multi-User-Dimension where people from all over the world join together to meet new people and have lots of Fun.

If you are new to mudding and have no clue as to what is need in order to get started then please read the Getting Started guide, or if your ready to play then please click the Play Havok button to the left.

But Anyway, I hope you Enjoy our site, If you have any questions or comments then feel free to Email me at Hoveyg@hotmail.com.  Have Fun and Enjoy!   

Banon and the Implementor Council.


 Havok News & Updates


New Content - Monday, August 12th, 2002

     First off, I'd just like to Thank Enialis for his fine work he's put into this page so far.  Enialis has basically implemented most of the skeleton of the page while myself (Banon) has been working on getting some content for it. Our Official Website should be up and ready for all to see.

But anyway, regarding Havok we've just moved to a new address.(havok.haaksman.org:6969)  Expect to see a few new code alterations also.  Anyway... Enjoy!! 


Last Updated on Monday, August 12th, 2002 by Greg Hovey
